examples.code:
say("hi")
wait(1)
say("bye", 1)

while(true) do
    if(isKeyPressed("space")) then
        say("space is pressed", 1)
    end
    wait()
end

for i=1, 10 do
    moveForward(0.1)
end

repeat
    moveForward(0.01)
until(false)

while(true) do
    moveForward(0.01)
end

while(true) do
    if(distanceTo("mouse-pointer")<3) then
        say("mouse-pointer")
    else
        say("")
    end
    wait(0.01)
end

myData = {
    {x=1, y=0, z=0, duration=0.5},
    {x=0, y=0, z=1, duration=0.5},
    {x=-1, y=0, z=-1, duration=1},
}
for i, item in ipairs(myData) do
    move(item.x, item.y, item.z, item.duration)
end

run(function()
    say("follow mouse pointer!")
    while(true) do
        if(distanceTo("mouse-pointer") < 7) then
            turnTo("mouse-pointer");
        elseif(distanceTo("@p") > 14) then
            moveTo("@p")
        end
    end
end)
run(function()
    while(true) do
        moveForward(0.02)
    end
end)

say("Press X key to exit")
registerKeyPressedEvent("x", function()
    exit()
end)

say("Press X key to restart")
registerKeyPressedEvent("x", function()
    restart()
end)
becomeAgent("@p")

local key = "value"
say(key, 1)

local key = "value"
say(key, 1)

_G.a = _G.a or 1
while(true) do
    _G.a = a + 1
    set("a", get("a") + 1)
    say(a)
end

_G.score = 1
_G.msg = "hello"

   _G.score = _G.score + 1
   wait(0.01)
end

_G.score = 1
showVariable("score")
wait(1);
hideVariable("score")

registerCloneEvent(function(msg)
    move(msg or 1, 0, 0, 0.5)
    wait(1)
    delete()
end)
clone()
clone("myself", 2)
clone("myself", 3)

registerClickEvent(function()
    move(1,0,0, 0.5)
end)
clone()
clone()
say("click")

move(1,0)
say("Default actor will be deleted!", 1)
delete()
registerCloneEvent(function()
    say("This clone will be deleted!", 1)
    delete()
end)
for i=1, 100 do
    clone()
    wait(2)
end

registerCloneEvent(function(name)
    setActorValue("name", name)
    moveForward(1);
end)
registerClickEvent(function()
    local myname = getActorValue("name")
    say("my name is "..myname)
end)
setActorValue("name", "Default")
setActorValue("color", "#ff0000")
clone("myself", "Cloned")
say("click us!")

registerCloneEvent(function(msg)
    setActorValue("name", msg.name)
    moveForward(msg.dist);
end)
registerClickEvent(function()
    local myname = getActorValue("name")
    say("my name is "..myname)
end)
setActorValue("name", "Default")
clone("myself", {name = "clone1", dist=1})
clone(nil, {name = "clone2", dist=2})
say("click us!")

log(123)
log("hello")
something = {any="object"}
log(something)

registerClickEvent(function()
    for i=1, 20 do
        scale(10)
    end
    for i=1, 20 do
        scale(-10)
    end
end)

registerKeyPressedEvent("space",function()
    say("Jump!", 1)
    move(0,1,0, 0.5)
    move(0,-1,0, 0.5)
    walkForward(0)
end)

registerBroadcastEvent("jump", function(fromName)
    move(0,1,0)
    wait(1)
    move(0,-1,0)
end)
registerClickEvent(function()
    broadcastAndWait("jump")
    say("That was fun!", 2)
end)
say("click to jump!")

registerBroadcastEvent("hello", function(msg)
    say("hello"..msg)
    move(0,1,0, 0.5)
    move(0,-1,0, 0.5)
    say("bye")
end)
for i=1, 2 do
    broadcast("hello", i)
    wait(0.5)
end

registerBroadcastEvent("hi", function(fromName)
    say("hi,"..tostring(fromName))
    wait(1)
    say("bye")
    wait(1)
end)
for i=1, 2 do
    broadcastAndWait("hi")
end

examples.desc: 播放电影方块中的角色动画
examples.code:
play(10, 1000)
say("No looping", 1)

examples.desc: 播放电影方块中的角色动画
examples.code:
playLoop(10, 1000)
say("Looping", 3)
stop()

playSpeed(4)
playLoop(0, 1000)
say("Looping", 3)
playSpeed(1)
stop()

playLoop(10, 1000)
wait(2)
stop()
turn(15)
playLoop(10, 1000)
wait(2)
stop()

scale(50)
wait(1)
scale(-50)

for i=1, 20 do
    scale(10)
end
scaleTo(50)
wait(0.5)
scaleTo(200)
wait(0.5)
scaleTo(100)

focus()
moveForward(2,2)
focus("player")

for i=1, 100 do
    camera(10+i*0.1, nil, nil)
    wait(0.05)
end

while(true) do
    if(getScale() >= 200) then
        scaleTo(100)
    else
        scale(10)
    end
end

playLoop(10, 2000)
while(true) do
    if(getPlayTime() > 1000) then
        say("hi")
    else
        say("")
    end
    wait(0.01);
end

turn(30);

    moveForward(0.05)
end

    turn(-3)
end

wait(1)
turnTo(0)

while(true) do
    say(getZ())

local x, y, z = getPos()
setPos(x, y+0.5, z)

local x, y, z = getPos()
setPos(x, y+0.5, z)

while(true) do
    say(getFacing())
end

while(true) do
    say(math.random(1,100))
    wait(0.5)
end

while(true) do
    a = math.random(0,10)
    if(a==0) then
        say(a)
    elseif(a<=3) then
        say(a.."<=3")
    elseif(a>6) then
        say(a..">6")
    else
        say("3<"..a.."<=6")
    end
    wait(2)
end

while(true) do
    a = math.random(0,10)
    if(3<a and a<=6) then
        say("3<"..a.."<=6")
    else
        say(a)
    end
    wait(2)
end

while(true) do
    a = math.random(0,10)
    if(a<=3 or a>6) then
        say(a)
    else
        say("3<"..a.."<=6")
    end
    wait(2)
end

while(true) do
    a = math.random(0,10)
    if((not (3<=a)) or (not (a>6))) then
        say("3<"..a.."<=6")
    else
        say(a)
    end
    wait(2)
end
say("hello ".."world".."!!!")
say("length of hello is "..(#"hello"));

while(true) do
    a = math.random(0,10) / 10
    b = math.floor(a+0.5)
    say(a.."=>"..b)
    wait(2)
end

say("math.sqrt(9)=="..math.sqrt(9), 1)
say("math.cos(1)=="..math.cos(1), 1)
say("math.abs(-1)=="..math.abs(1), 1)

examples.desc: 是否和方块与人物有接触
examples.code:
turnTo(45)
while(true) do
    moveForward(0.1)
    if(isTouching(62)) then
        say("grass block!", 1)
    elseif(isTouching("block")) then
        bounce()
    elseif(isTouching("box")) then
        bounce()
    end
end

while(true) do
    if(distanceTo("mouse-pointer") < 3) then
        say("mouse-pointer")
    elseif(distanceTo("@p") < 10) then
        say("player")
    elseif(distanceTo("@p") > 10) then
        say("nothing")
    end
    wait(0.01)
end

ask("what is your name")
say("hello "..tostring(answer), 2)

ask("select your choice", {"choice A", "choice B"})
if(answer == 1) then
    say("you choose A")
elseif(answer == 2) then
    say("you choose B")
end

run(function()
   wait(3)
   ask()
end)

say("
Like A or B?
html are supported") ask("type A or B") if(answer == "A") then say("A is good", 2) elseif(answer == "B") then say("B is fine", 2) else say("i do not understand you", 2) end

say("press left/right key to move me!")
while(true) do
    if(isKeyPressed("left")) then
        move(0, 0.1)
        say("")
    elseif(isKeyPressed("right")) then
        move(0, -0.1)
        say("")
    end
    wait()
end

say("press any key to continue!")
while(true) do
    if(isKeyPressed("any")) then
        say("you pressed a key!", 2)
    end
    wait()
end

while(true) do
    local x, y, z, blockid = mousePickBlock();
    if(x) then
        say(format("%s %s %s :%d", x, y, z, blockid))
    end
end

local x,y,z = getPos()
local id = getBlock(x,y+2,z)
setBlock(x,y+2,z, 62)
wait(1)
-- 0 to delete block
setBlock(x,y+2,z, 0)
setBlock(x,y+2,z, id)
